mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.product_id, c.product_cnt, p.product_name, p.product_detail, p.price, s.store_name, img.p_img_url AS p_img_url FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id JOIN ( SELECT * FROM p_img WHERE p_img_enum = 'THUMBNAIL' AND p_img_seq = 1 ) img ON p.product_id = img.product_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
